title: Issue in Connecting to wifi network
content:
There is issue in connecting to my home wifi network. It works fine until I switch to mobile data and back to wifi.

After I switch to mobile data, and when I try to connect to wifi, the wifi name is not visible at all.

It has been going on for few days now. Restarting the phone works. But it is not a viable solution, as I have been doing multiple times every day
